text.title: Show | Hacker News
text.text: Show | Hacker News Hacker News new | past | comments | ask | show | jobs | submit login Please read the Show HN rules and tips before posting. You can browse the newest Show HNs here . 1. Show HN: Walrus – a Kafka alternative written in Rust ( github.com/nubskr ) 50 points by janicerk 4 hours ago | 17 comments 2. Show HN: MTXT – Music Text Format ( github.com/daninet ) 21 points by daninet 3 hours ago | 7 comments 3. Show HN: I built a dashboard to compare mortgage rates across 120 credit unions ( finfam.app ) 278 points by mhashemi 17 hours ago | 93 comments 4. Show HN: Mdit – clean Markdown notes with local files ( mdit.app ) 2 points by hjinco 44 minutes ago | 1 comment 5. Show HN: A Minimal Monthly Task Planner (printable, offline, no signup) ( printcalendar.top ) 70 points by defcc 8 hours ago | 25 comments 6. Show HN: Mirror_bridge – C++ Reflection powered Python binding generation ( github.com/franciscothiesen ) 19 points by fthiesen 7 hours ago | 2 comments 7. Show HN: Fresh – A new terminal editor built in Rust ( sinelaw.github.io ) 157 points by _sinelaw_ 20 hours ago | 117 comments 8. Show HN: Microlandia, a brutally honest city builder ( microlandia.city ) 97 points by phaser 19 hours ago | 18 comments 9. Show HN: FirstDistro – I lost a $5k/mo customer overnight ( firstdistro.com ) 4 points by Jide_Lambo 3 hours ago | discuss 10. Show HN: Made HN, but for Music – Sonusly ( sonusly.com ) 3 points by lorenzosch 3 hours ago | discuss 11. Show HN: Identifiy test coverage gaps in your Go projects ( github.com/leanercloud ) 11 points by alien_ 10 hours ago | 2 comments 12. Show HN: Banana Pro – AI image editing powered by Google's official API ( banana-pro.io ) 2 points by derek39576 4 hours ago | discuss 13. Show HN: RAG in 3 Lines of Python ( pypi.org ) 14 points by init0 13 hours ago | 4 comments 14. Show HN: I made a simple, 100% free marketplace to buy or sell micro-startups ( buy-startups.com ) 2 points by aiseoscan 5 hours ago | discuss 15. Show HN: Searchable AI visibility index (15k+ brands, 500 industries) ( trakkr.ai ) 4 points by mektrik 5 hours ago | discuss 16. Show HN: FastLanes based integer compression in Zig ( github.com/steelcake ) 11 points by ozgrakkurt 15 hours ago | 7 comments 17. Show HN: TidesDB – A storage engine that outperforms RocksDB ( github.com/tidesdb ) 3 points by alexpadula 8 hours ago | discuss 18. Show HN: Onetone – A full-stack framework with custom C interpreter ( github.com/onetoneframework ) 2 points by tactics6655 7 hours ago | discuss 19. Show HN: Marmot – Single-binary data catalog (no Kafka, no Elasticsearch) ( github.com/marmotdata ) 97 points by charlie-haley 1 day ago | 21 comments 20. Show HN: AI music and auto-charting and custom rhythm minigame sandbox ( rhythm-seodang-web.vercel.app ) 5 points by sputnikwrkshp 10 hours ago | discuss 21. Show HN: Stanford's ACE paper was just open sourced ( github.com/ace-agent ) 4 points by vmsn 15 hours ago | 1 comment 22. Show HN: EchoCopi Local-first, model-agnostic alternative to Google Antigravity 3 points by sparksupernova 11 hours ago | discuss 23. Show HN: A $20/year invoicing tool for solo developers (simple, fast, no bloat) ( sidepay.app ) 11 points by mightbefun 22 hours ago | 4 comments 24. Show HN: The Taka Programming Language ( codeberg.org/marton ) 11 points by mgunyho 23 hours ago | 4 comments 25. Show HN: ESLint-plugin-code-complete – ESLint Rules for Code Complete ( github.com/aryelu ) 3 points by arye_lu 15 hours ago | discuss 26. Show HN: Boing ( greg.technology ) 773 points by gregsadetsky 4 days ago | 145 comments 27. Show HN: Rust Client Library for Gradium.ai TTS/STT API ( github.com/cydanix ) 3 points by irqlevel 16 hours ago | discuss 28.
